divy35:2: buddho bhagavāñ śrāvastyāṁ viharati sma jetavane ’nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme |
divy35:5: sa tayā sārdhaṁ krīḍati tamate paricārayati |
divy35:8: sa kare kapolaṁ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ |
divy35:11: sā kathayati—kasmāttvaṁ brāhmaṇa kare kapolaṁ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitah? sa kathayati—mamāpatyaṁ jātaṁ jātaṁ kālaṁ karoti |
divy35:14: sa kathayati—yadā tava patvyāḥ prasavakālaḥ syāt, tadā māṁ śabdāpayethā iti |
divy35:15: athāpareṇa samayena tasya patnyāḥ prasavakāle jātaḥ |
divy35:19: tayā sa dārakaḥ snāpayitvā śuklena veṣṭayitvā navanītenāsyaṁ pūrayitvā dārikāyā haste ’nupradattaḥ |
divy35:21: yaṁ kaṁcit paśyasi brāhmaṇaṁ vā, sa vaktavyah—ayaṁ dārakaḥ pādābhivandanaṁ karotīti |
divy35:22: astaṁ gate āditye yadi jīvati, gṛhītvā āgaccha |
divy35:26: sā dārikā sagauravā sapratīśā pādabhivandanaṁ kṛtvā kathayati—ayaṁ dāraka āryāṇāṁ pādābhivandanaṁ karoti |
divy35:27: te kathayanti—ciraṁ jīva, dīrghamāyuḥ pālayatu, mātāpitrormanorathaṁ pūrayatu |
divy35:28: sthavirasthvirā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvāhṇakālasamaye nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastyāṁ piṇḍāya praviśanti |
divy35:29: sā dārikā sagauravā sapratīśā pādābhivandanaṁ kṛtvā kathayati—ayaṁ dāraka āryāṇāṁ pādābhivandanaṁ karotīti |
divy35:30: sthavirāḥ kathayanti—suciraṁ jīvatu, dīrghamāyuḥ pālayatu, mātāpitromanorathaṁ pūrayatu |
divy35:31: bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastīṁ piṇḍāya praviśati sma |
divy35:32: sā dārikā sagauravā sapratīśā pādābhivandanaṁ kṛtvā kathayati—bhagavān, ayaṁ dārako bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṁ karotīti |
divy35:33: bhagavānāha—ciraṁ jīvatu, dīrghamāyuḥ pālayatu, mātāpitromanorathaṁ pūrayatu |
divy35:36: sā taiḥ pṛṣṭā—jīvati dārakah? sā kathayati—jīvati |
divy35:38: te kathayanti—kiṁ bhavatu dārakasya nāma? ayaṁ dārako mahāpathe dhāritaḥ |
divy35:40: mahāpanthako dāraka unnīto vardhito mahān saṁvṛttaḥ |
divy35:41: sa yadā mahān saṁvṛttastadā lipyāmupanyastaḥ, saṁkhyāyāṁ gaṇanāyāṁ mudrāyāṁ brāhmaṇikāyāmīryāyāṁ śauce samudācāre bhasmagrahe autkare bhoskāre ṛgvede yajurvede sāmavede ’tharvavede yajane yājane ’dhyayane ’dhyāpane dāne pratigrahe |
divy35:44: tasya bhūyaḥ krīḍato ramataḥ paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasattvā saṁvṛttā |
divy35:49: tayā sa dārakaḥ snāpayitvā śuklena vastreṇa veṣṭayitvā navanītenāsyaṁ pūrayitvā dārikāyā haste dattaḥ |
divy35:50: sā dārikoktā—imaṁ tvaṁ dārakaṁ caturmahāpathe dhāraya |
divy35:51: yadi kaṁcitpaśyasi śramaṇaṁ brāhmaṇaṁ vā, sa vaktavyah—ayaṁ dāraka āryasya pādābhivandanaṁ karoti |
divy35:52: astaṁ gata āditye yadi jīvati, gṛhītvā āgaccha |
divy35:54: sā dārikā alasajātīyā taṁ dārakamādāya panthalikāyāṁ sthitā |
divy35:56: sā dārikā sagauravā sapratīśā pādabhivandanaṁ kṛtvā kathayati—ārya, ayaṁ daraka āryāṇāṁ pādābhivandanaṁ karoti |
divy35:57: te kathayanti—ciraṁ jīvatu, dīrghamāyuḥ pālayatu, mātāpitromanorathaṁ pūrayatu |
divy35:60: sā taiḥ pṛṣṭā—jīvati dārakah? sā kathayati—jīvatīti |
divy35:61: te kathayanti—kutra tvayaiṣa dhāritah? sā kathayati—amuṣyāṁ panthalikāyām |
divy35:62: te kathayanti—kiṁ bhavatu dārakasya nāma? ayaṁ dārakaḥ panthalikāyāṁ dhāritaḥ |
divy35:64: panthako dāraka unnīto vardhito mahān saṁvṛttiḥ |
divy35:67: atha tasyācāryaḥ kathayati—brāhmaṇa, mayā prabhūtadārakāḥ pāṭhayitavyāḥ |
divy35:69: mahāpanthakasyālpamucyate prabhūtaṁ gṛhṇāti, asya tu panthakasya sītyukte dhamiti vismarati |
divy35:70: brāhmaṇaḥ saṁlakṣayati—sarve brāhmaṇā lipyakṣarakuśalā bhavanti, vedabrāhmaṇa eṣa bhaviṣyati |
divy35:72: tasya omityukte bhūriti vismarati, bhūrityukta omiti vismarati |
divy35:75: asya omityukte bhūriti vismarati, bhūrityukta omiti vismarati |
divy35:76: brāhmaṇaḥ saṁlakṣayati—na sarve brāhmaṇā vedapāragā bhavanti |
divy35:78: sa yatra kvacinnimantritako gacchati, tameva panthakamādāya gacchati |
divy35:79: atha tena samayena sa brāhmaṇo glānībhūtaḥ |
divy35:81: sa tena mahāpanthaka uktah—putra, tvaṁ mamātyayādaśocyo ’si |
divy35:82: api tu tvayā panthakasya yogodvahanaṁ kartavyamiti |
divy35:83: ityuktvā— sarve kṣayāntā nicayāḥ patanāntāḥ samucchrayāḥ |
divy35:86: te taṁ nīlapītalohitāvadātairvastraiḥ śibikāmalaṁkṛtya mahatā satkāreṇa śmaśāne dhmāpayitvā śokavinodaṁ kṛtvā avasthitāḥ |
divy35:88: āyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau pañcaśataparivārau kosaleṣu jānapadeṣu cārikāṁ carantau śrāvastīmanuprāptau |
divy35:89: śrāvastyāṁ janakāyena śrutam—āyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau pañcaśataparivārau kosaleṣu jānapadeṣu cārikāṁ carantau śrāvastīmanuprāptau |
divy35:90: śrutvā ca punaḥ sa janakāyo bahir nirgantumārabdhaḥ |
divy35:91: mahāpanthako ’pi bahiḥ śrāvastyāmanyatamasmin vṛkṣamūle pañcamātrāṇi māṇavakaśatāni brāhmaṇakān mantrān vācayati |
divy35:92: tena sa janakāyaḥ śrāvastyā nirgacchan dṛṣṭaḥ |
divy35:93: sa tān māṇavakān pṛcchati—bhavantaḥ, ka eṣa mahājanakāyo nirgacchati? te tasya kathayanti—upādhyāya, bhadantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau pañcaśataparivārau kosaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṁ caritvā iha śrāvastīmanuprāptau, taddarśanāyopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy35:94: kiṁ nu tau draṣṭavyau? yatredānīṁ tadagraṁ varṇamapahāya dvitīyavarṇasya śramaṇasya gautamasyāntike pravrajitau |
divy35:98: yadyupādhyāyasteṣāṁ dharmaṁ śṛṇuyāt, sthānametadvidyate yadupādhyāyasyāpi rocate |
divy35:99: ācaritaṁ teṣāṁ māṇavakānām yadā apāṭhā bhavanti, te kadācinnagarāvalokanayā gacchanti |
divy35:102: apareṇa samayena te sarve apāṭhāḥ saṁvṛttāḥ |
divy35:107: tena tasya daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā vistareṇa saṁprakāśitāḥ |
divy35:113: tena tasya dvādaśāṅgaḥ pratītyasamutpādo ’nulomapratilomo vistareṇa prakāśitaḥ |
divy35:114: so ’bhiprasannaḥ kathayati—bho bhikṣu, labheyāhaṁ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṁ bhikṣubhāvam |
divy35:121: sa tena janapadaṁ nītvā pravrajitah upasampāditaḥ, uktaśca |
divy35:124: tena divā uddiśatā yoniśo bhāvayatā trīṇi piṭakāni, rātrau cintayatā tulayatā upaparīkṣamāṇena sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhatvaṁ sākṣātkṛtam |
divy35:125: arhan saṁvṛttastraidhatukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṁvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāḍbhukhaḥ |
divy35:128: yadā panthakasya bhogāstanutvaṁ parikṣayaṁ paryādānaṁ gatāḥ, sa kṛcchreṇa jīvikāṁ kalpayitumārabdhaḥ |
divy35:131: athāyuṣmān mahāpanthakaḥ pañcaśataparivāro yena śrāvastī tena cārikāṁ prakrāntaḥ |
divy35:133: śrāvastyāṁ janakāyena śrutam—āryo mahāpanthakaḥ pañcaśataparivāraḥ kosaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṁ carañ śrāvastīmanuprāptaḥ |
divy35:136: sa pṛcchati—bhavantaḥ, kutreṣu mahājanakāyo gacchati? te kathayanti—āryo mahāpanthakaḥ pañcaśataparivātaḥ kosaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṁ carañ śrāvastīmanuprāptaḥ |
divy35:138: panthakaḥ saṁlakṣayati—eṣāmasau na bhrātā na jñātiḥ |
divy35:140: ahaṁ kasmāttaṁ na darśanāyopasaṁkrāmāmi? so ’pi taddarśanāyopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy35:141: sa tena dṛṣṭaḥ pṛṣṭaśca—panthaka, katham yāpayasi? kṛcchreṇa yāpayāmi? kiṁ na pravrajasi? sa kathayati—ahaṁ cūḍaḥ paramacūḍo dhanvaḥ paramadhanvaḥ |
divy35:142: ko māṁ pravrājayiṣyatīti? āyuṣmān mahāpanthakaḥ saṁlakṣayati—santyasya kānicitkuśalamūlāni? santi |
divy35:143: kenāyaṁ na yogyah? āgaccha, ahaṁ tvāṁ pravrājayiṣyāmi |
divy35:145: tena tasyoddeśo dattah— pāpaṁ na kuryānmanasā na vācā kāyena vā kiṁcana sarvaloke |
divy35:146: riktaḥ kāmaiḥ smṛtimān saṁprajānan duḥkhaṁ na sa vidyādanarthopasaṁhitam (1)|
divy35:147: tasyaiṣā gāthā traimāsyenāpi na vṛttā jātā |
divy35:148: anyeṣāṁ gopālakānāṁ paśupālakānāṁ śrutvā pravṛttā jātā |
divy35:151: dharmatā khalu yathā buddhānāṁ bhagavatāṁ dvau śrāvakāṇāṁ saṁnipātau bhavataḥ, āṣāḍhyāṁ varṣopanāyikāyāṁ kārtikapūrṇamāsyām |
divy35:153: tatra ye āṣāḍhīvarṣopanāyikāyāmupasaṁkrāmanti, te tāṁstān manasikāraviśeṣānādāya tāsu tāsu grāmanigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu varṣā upagacchanti |
divy35:154: ye kārtikyāṁ ca pūrṇamāsyāmupasaṁkramanti, te svādhyāyanikāṁ paripṛcchanikāṁ ca yācanti, yathādhigataṁ cārocayanti |
divy35:155: āyuṣmato mahāpanthakasya sārdhaṁvihāryantevāsikā bhikṣavo janapade varṣoṣitāḥ, te ’pyeva kārtikyāṁ pūrṇamāsyām yenāyuṣmān mahāpanthakastenopasaṁkrāntāḥ |
divy35:157: tatra ye cūḍā bhavanti paramacūḍā dhanvāḥ paramadhanvāḥ, te ṣaḍvargīyān sevante bhajante paryupāsante |
divy35:158: āyuṣmān panthakaḥ ṣaḍvargīyān sevate bhajate paryupāsate |
divy35:159: sa ṣaḍvargīyairucyate—āyuṣman panthaka, tava samānopādhyāyā upādhyāyasyāntikātsvadhyāyinikāṁ paripṛcchinikām yācanti |
divy35:161: sa kathayati—mayā na kiṁcitpaṭhitaṁ traimāsye, na tvekā gāthā mama vṛttā jātā, kimahaṁ svādhyāyinikām yāceyamiti? te kathayanti—nanūktaṁ bhagavatā—asvādhyāyamānā mattā iti |
divy35:162: kiṁ tavāsvādhyāyamānasya gāthā anupravṛttā bhaviṣyati? gaccha, yācāhi |
divy35:163: sa gatvā kathayati—upādhyāya, svādhyāyinikāṁ tāvanme dehi |
divy35:164: āyuṣmān mahāpanthakaḥ saṁlakṣayati—kimasyedaṁ svaṁ pratibhānamāhosvit kenacitprayuktah? sa paśyati—yāvatprayuktaḥ |
divy35:165: āyuṣmān mahāpanthakaḥ saṁlakṣayati—kiṁ nvayamutsahanāvineya āhosvidavasāadanāvineyah? sa paśyati—yāvadavasādanāvineyaḥ |
divy35:166: sa tena grīvāayāṁ gṛhītvā bahirvihārasya niṣkāsitaḥ |
divy35:168: kiṁ tvamasmiñ śāsane kariṣyasi? sa roditumārabdhaḥ |
divy35:171: dṛṣṭvā ca punarāgacchantamidamavocat—kasmāttvaṁ pathaka vahirvihārasya rodiṣyasi, aśrūṇi vartayasi? ahamasmi bhadanta upādhyāyena niṣkāsitaḥ |
divy35:173: bhagavānāha—nedaṁ vatsa maunīndraṁ vacanaṁ tavopādhyāyena tribhiḥ kalpāsaṁkhyeyairaneikairduṣkaraśatasahasraiḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrya samudānītam, api tu mayedaṁ maunīndraṁ pravacanaṁ tribhiḥ kalpāsaṁkhyeyairanaikairduṣkaraśatasahasraiḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrya samudānītam |
divy35:174: na śakyasi tvaṁ tathāgatasyāntikātpaṭhitum? ahamasmi bhadanta cūḍaḥ paramacūḍo dhanvaḥ paramadhanvaḥ |
divy35:175: atha bhagavānasyāmutpattau gāthāṁ bhāṣate— yo bālo bālabhāvena paṇḍitastatra tena saḥ |
divy35:176: bālaḥ paṇḍitamānī tu sa vai bāla ihocyate (2)|
divy35:177: asthānamanavakāśo yadbuddhā bhagavantaḥ padaśo dharmaṁ vācayiṣyanti nedaṁ sthānaṁ vidyate |
divy35:178: tatra bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma—imaṁ pāṭhaya tvamānanda panthakam |
divy35:181: āyuṣmānānando bhagavantamidamavocat—mayā tāvadbhadanta śāsturupasthānaṁ karaṇīyam, śrutamudgrahītavyam, gaṇo vācayitavyaḥ |
divy35:184: bhagavatā tasya dve pade datte—rajo harāmi, malaṁ harāmīti |
divy35:198: athāyuṣmataḥ panthakasya rātryāḥ pratyūṣasamaye etadabhavat—bhagavānevamāha—rajo harāmi, malaṁ harāmīti |
divy35:199: kiṁ nu bhagavānādhyātmikaṁ rajaḥ saṁdhāyāha āhosvidbāhyam? tasyaivaṁ cintayatastasyāṁ velāyāmaṣrutapūrvāstisro gāthā āmukhīpravṛttā jātāh— rajo ’tra rāgo na hi reṇureṣa rajo rāgasyādhivacanaṁ na reṇoḥ |
divy35:200: etadrajaḥ prativinudanti paṇḍitā na ye pramattāḥ sugatasya śāsane (3)|
divy35:201: rajo ’tra dveṣo na hi reṇureṣa rajo dveṣasyādhivacanaṁ na reṇoḥ |
divy35:202: etadrajaḥ prativinudanti paṇḍitā na ye pramattāḥ sugatasya śāsane (4)|
divy35:203: rajo ’tra moho na hi reṇureṣa rajo mohasyādhivacanaṁ na reṇoḥ |
divy35:204: etadrajaḥ prativinudanti paṇḍitā na ye pramattāaḥ sugatasya śāsane (5)|
divy35:206: arhan saṁvṛttas traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṁvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparānmukhaḥ |
divy35:210: sa tena bāhau gṛhītvoktah—āgaccha svādhyāyinikāṁ tāvatkuru, tataḥ paścāddhyāyiṣyasīti |
divy35:211: athāyuṣmatā panthakena sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṁ sākṣātkṛtam, gajabhujasadṛśo bāhurutsṛṣṭaḥ |
divy35:212: āyuṣmatā mahāpanthakena pṛṣṭato mukhaṁ vyavalokayatā dṛṣṭaḥ |
divy35:213: sa kathayati—āyuṣman panthaka, evaṁ te tvayā guṇagaṇā adhigatāh? adhigatāḥ |
divy35:215: yadā āyuṣmatā panthakena sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṁ sākṣātkṛtam, anyatīrthikā avadhyāyanti dhriyanti vivācayanti |
divy35:216: śramaṇo gautama evamāha—gambhīro me dharmo gambhīrāvabhāso durdṛśo durnubodho ’tarko ’tarkāvacaraḥ, sūkṣumo nipuṇapaṇḍitavijñavedanīyaḥ |
divy35:217: atredānīṁ kiṁ gambhīro ’sya, yasyedānīṁ panthakaprabhṛtayaścūḍāḥ paramacūḍā dhanvāḥ paramadhanvāḥ pravrajanti |
divy35:218: bhagavān saṁlakṣayati—sumeruprakhye mahāśrāvake mahājanakāyaḥ kṣāntiṁ gṛhṇāti |
divy35:220: tatra bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate—gaccha ānanda, panthakasya kathaya—bhikṣuṇyaste avavaditavyā iti |
divy35:221: evaṁ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yenāyuṣmān panthakastenopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy35:222: upasaṁkramyāyuṣmantaṁ panthakamidamavocat—śāstā tvāmāyuṣman panthaka evamāha—bhikṣuṇyaste avavaditavyā iti |
divy35:223: āyuṣmān panthakaḥ kathayati—kimarthaṁ sthavirasthavirān bhikṣūnapahāya māṁ bhagavān bhikṣuṇyavavādakamājñāpayati? mamaiva guṇodbhāvanā kartavyeti śāsturmanorathaṁ paripūrayiṣyāmīti |
divy35:225: tā bhikṣūn pṛcchanti—bhagavatā ko ’smākamavavādaka ājñaptah? te kathayanti—āyuṣmān panthakaḥ |
divy35:226: tāḥ kathayanti—bhaginyaḥ, paśyata kathaṁ mātṛgrāmaḥ paribhūtaḥ |
divy35:227: yena tribhirmāsairekā gāthā paṭhitā, sāpi na pravṛttā |
divy35:230: tāḥ parṣadamāgatā bhikṣuṇībhiḥ pṛṣṭāh—bhaginyaḥ, ko ’smākamavavaditumāgamiṣyati? tāḥ kathayanti—āryapanthakaḥ |
divy35:231: kimāryo mahāpanthakah? na hyayam, sa tvanyaścūḍāpanthakaḥ |
divy35:234: bhaginyaḥ paśyata, kathaṁ mātṛgrāmaḥ paribhūtah? yena tribhirmāsairekā gāthā paṭhitā, sāpi na pravṛttā |
divy35:235: imā bhikṣuṇyastripiṭā dharmakathikā yuktamuktapratibhānāḥ, sa kila kimāsāmavavadiṣyatīti? tāḥ kathayanti—bhaginyaḥ, ṣaḍjanyo dvādaśahastikābhirlatābhiḥ siṁhāsanaṁ prajñapayantu |
divy35:236: ṣaḍjanyaḥ śrāvastyāṁ praviśya rathya rathyāvīthicatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣvārocayantu—so ’smākaṁ tādṛśo ’vavādaka āgamiṣyati, yo ’smākaṁ tanusatyāni na drakṣyati |
divy35:238: yena na kaścit putramoṭikāputro ’lpaśruta utsahate bhikṣuṇīravavaditum |
divy35:239: tāsāṁ ṣaḍbhir janībhir dvādaśahastikābhir latābhiḥ saṁhāsanaṁ prajñaptam, ṣaḍbhikṣuṇībhiḥ śrāvastīṁ praviśya rathyāvīthicatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣvārocitam—so ’smākaṁ tādṛśo ’vavādaka āgamiṣyati, yo ’smākaṁ tanusatyāni na drakṣyati |
divy35:241: āyuṣmān panthakaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastīṁ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat |
divy35:242: kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktāpiṇḍapātrapratikrāntaḥ pātracīvaraṁ pratisamayya pādau prakṣālya vihāraṁ praviṣṭaḥ pratisamlayanāya |
divy35:243: athāyuṣmān panthakaḥ sāyāhne pratisamlayanāya vyutthāya saṁghāṭīmādāya anyatamena bhikṣuṇā paścāccramaṇena saṁprasthitaḥ |
divy35:244: anekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi—kāni ca kutūhalajātāni, kānicit pūrvakaiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ saṁcodyamānāni |
divy35:245: adrākṣīt sā pariṣat āyuṣmantaṁ panthakaṁ dūrādeva |
divy35:246: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ parasparaṁ pṛcchati—kataro ’tra bhikṣuṇyavavādakah? kiṁ puraḥśramaṇaḥ, āhosvit paścācchramaṇah? tatraike kathayanti—puraḥśramaṇaḥ |
divy35:248: yena tribhirmāsairekā gāthā paṭhitā, sāpi na pravṛttā, sa kiṁ bhikṣuṇīravavadiṣyati, dharmaṁ vā vācayiṣyati? gacchāmaḥ |
divy35:249: apare kathayanti—tiṣṭhāmo yadi dharmaṁ deśayiṣyati, śroṣyāmaḥ |
divy35:252: āyuṣmatā panthakena siṁhāsanaṁ dṛṣṭaṁ prajñaptakaṁ dṛṣṭvā saṁlakṣayati—kiṁ tāvat prasādajātābhiḥ prajñaptamāhosvit viheṭhanābhiprāyābhih? paśyati—yāvat viheṭhanābhiprayābhiḥ |
divy35:253: dṛṣṭvā saṁlakṣayati—kiṁ tāvat prasādajātābhiḥ prajñaptamāhosvit viheṭhanābhiprasāyābhih? paśyati—yāvat viheṭhanābhiprāyābhiḥ |
divy35:254: āyuṣmatā panthakena gajabhujasadṛśaṁ bāhumabhiprasārya taṁ siṁhāsanam yathāsthāne sthāpitam |
divy35:256: sa niṣīdan kaiścit dṛṣṭah. kaiścit na dṛṣṭaḥ |
divy35:257: athātrastha āyuṣmān panthakastadrūpaṁ samādhiṁ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte sve āsane ’ntarhitaḥ, pūrvasyāṁ diśi uparivihāyasamabhyudgamya pūrvavat yāvat ṛddhiprātihāryāṇi vidarśya tān ṛddhyabhisaṁskārān pratiprasrabhya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ |
divy35:258: niṣadya āyuṣmān panthakastā bhikṣuṇīrāmantrayate—mayā bhaginyastribhirmāsairekā gāthā paṭhitā |
divy35:259: utsahetavyāni(?) śrotumekagāthāyāḥ saptarātriṁdivasānyanyaiḥ padairvyañjanairarthaṁ vibhaktum? pāpaṁ na kuryānmanasā na vācā kāyena vā kiṁcana sarvaloke |
divy35:260: riktaḥ kāmeiḥ smṛtimān saṁprajānan duḥkhaṁ na sa vidyādanarthopasaṁhitam (6)|
divy35:262: sarvapāpasya bhagavān kāraṇamāha—yāvadgāthārthasyārthamadhītam yāti, tāvad dvādaśabhiḥ prāṇisahasraiḥ satyāni dṛṣṭāni |
divy35:263: kaiścicchrotāpattiphalaṁ sākṣātkṛtam, kaiścit sakṛdāgāmiphalam, kaiścidanāgāmiphalam, kaiścit pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṁ sākṣātkṛtam, kaiścicchrāvakabodhau cittānyutpāditāni, kaiścit pratyekāyāṁ bodhau, kaiścidanuttarāyāṁ samyaksambodhau cittānyutpāditāni |
divy35:264: yadbhūyasā sā pariṣad buddhaniṁnādharmapravaṇā saṁghaprāgbhārā vyavasthitā |
divy35:265: athāyuṣmān panthakastāṁ pariṣadaṁ dharmyayā kathayā saṁdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṁpraharṣyotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ |
divy35:267: te saṁlakṣayanti—adyāyuṣmatā panthakena mahājanakāyaḥ prasādito bhaviṣyati |
divy35:268: te na ṣaknuvantyāyuṣmantaṁ panthakaṁ saṁmukhamapriyaṁ praṣṭum |
divy35:270: āyuṣman, adya āyuṣmatā panthakena kiṁ mahājanakāyo na prasādito vā prasāditah? āyuṣmatā na kaścit aprasāditaḥ |
divy35:271: bhagavatā vārāṇasyām ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve triparivartaṁ dvādaśākāraṁ dharmyaṁ cakraṁ pravartitam, tadadyāyuṣmatā panthakenānupravartitam |
divy35:272: yāvadgāthārthaṁ na vibhajati, tāvad dvādaśabhiḥ praṇisahasraiḥ satyāni dṛṣṭāni |
divy35:274: tatra bhagavāan bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma—eṣo ’gro me bhikṣavo bhikcūṇāṁ mama śrāvakāṇāṁ cetovivartakuśalānām yaduta panthako bhikṣuḥ |
divy35:275: bhikṣavo buddhaṁ bhagavantaṁ pṛcchanti—paśya bhadanta dvādaśavargīyābhirāyuṣmataḥ panthakasyānarthaṁ kariṣyāmi ityatha eva kṛtaḥ |
divy35:276: bhagavānāha—na bhikṣava etarhi yathā atīte ’pyadhvani ābhiranarthaṁ kariṣyāma ityartha eva kṛtaḥ |
divy35:281: sa tayā sardhaṁ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
divy35:282: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato bhūyaḥ krīḍati ramate paricārayati yāvar dvādaśa putrā jātāḥ |
divy35:287: yadā tāsāṁ svāmino bahir nirgatā bhavanti, tadā tāḥ parapuruṣaiḥ sārdhaṁ paricārayanti |
divy35:289: sa jānāti—ayaṁ mama putrasya śabdaḥ, ayaṁ parapuruṣayeti |
divy35:290: sa puruṣāṇāṁ padaśabdāñ śrutvā tāḥ snuṣā garjayati. tāḥ saṁlakṣayanti—ayaṁ brāhmaṇp^smākamanarthāya pratipannaḥ |
divy35:292: taistā uktāh—kiṁ kāraṇam yūyaṁ tātasya cakaṭyodanaṁ kāñjikacchiṭiṁ cānuprayacchata? tāḥ kathayanti—tasya puṇyāni parikṣīṇāni, asyārthe piparīkāyāṁ ta:ḍulāḥ prakṣiptā bhavanti, cakaṭyodanaṁ parivartate, dadhi prakṣiptaṁ kāñjikaṁ parivartate |
divy35:293: te kathayanti—kimetadevaṁ bhaviṣyati? tāḥ kathayanti—vayam yuṣmākaṁ pratyakṣīkariṣyāmaḥ |
divy35:295: tābhiḥ kumbhakāara uktah—śakṣyasi tvaṁ bhadramukham ekamukhike dve sthālyau kartum? sa kathayati—śakṣyāmi |
divy35:297: tābhirekasyāṁ sthālyāṁ cakaṭitaṇḍulāḥ prakṣiptāḥ, dvitīyāyāṁ kāñjikam |
divy35:298: tābhiḥ svāmināṁ purastādekasya sthālyāṁ taṇḍulāḥ prakṣiptā ekasyāṁ dadhi |
divy35:302: tābhisteṣāṁ purastāttasyaukasyāḥ sthālyā uddhṛtya cakaṭyodanaṁ dattaṁ dvitīyāyāḥ kañjikam |
divy35:303: tata evaṁ tābhisteṣāmekasyāḥ sthālyā uddhṛtya śālyodanaṁ dattaṁ dvitīyāyā dadhi uddhṛtam |
divy35:304: te tasya kathayanti—tāta, tava puṇyāni parikṣīṇāni |
divy35:305: yata ekasyāṁ sthālyāṁ śālitaṇḍulāḥ prakṣiptāḥ, dvitīyasyāṁ dadhi, taccakaṭyodanaṁ kāñjikaṁ ca parivṛttam |
divy35:307: kiṁ kāraṇaṁ mama puṇyāni parikṣīṇāni? tena tāsāmapratyakṣaṁ mahānasaṁ praviśya paryeṣamāṇena hastasaṁspatśenaikamukhe dve sthālyau labdhe |
divy35:309: tena etṣāṁ putrāṇāmāgatānāṁ te pradarśite—paśyata, mama puṇyāni parikṣīṇāni |
divy35:310: gatvā paśyadhvamasmākaṁ gṛha eva ekamukhī sthālī |
divy35:311: putraka, anyeṣu geheṣu na shālīdvayaṁ tvakamukhamasmākaṁ mandabhāgyānām |
divy35:317: tāḥ pṛcchanti—asti sarpa iti? sa kathayati—kīdṛśaṁ sarpaṁ mṛgayatha jīvantamāhosvit mṛtakamiti? tāḥ kathayanti—mṛtakam |
divy35:318: sa saṁlakṣayati—kemetā mṛtakena sarpeṇa kariṣyanti? nūnametā etaṁ vṛddhaṁ mārayitukāmā bhaviṣyanti |
divy35:319: dharmatā khalu sarpasya ruṣitasya dvayoḥ sthānayorviṣaṁ saṁkrāmati—śirasi pucche ca |
divy35:320: tena roṣitvā śiraḥ pucchaṁ svayaṁ chittvā tāsāṁ madhye sarpā dattaḥ |
divy35:321: tābhirjomāṁ sādhayitvā sa brāhmaṇa uktah—tāta, hilimāṁ joma pāsyasi? sa brāhmaṇaḥ saṁlakṣayati—kimetā me hilimāṁ jomāṁ dāsyanti? nūnaṁ kiṁcit abhaiṣajyaṁ dattaṁ bhaviṣyati |
divy35:322: sa saṁlakṣayati—pibāmi, yathā ca tathā marāmi |
divy35:330: tāḥ kathayanti—tāta, bhūyaḥ pāsyasi? sa kathayati—pāsyāmīti |
divy35:333: tasya tena bāṣpeṇa bhūyasyā mātrayā paṭale sphuṭite |
divy35:335: tāḥ pūrvam yathā tasyāndhasya tato viśvastā vihṛtavantyastathaiva vihartumārabdhāḥ |
divy35:337: kathayati ca—kim yūyaṁ jānītha idānīmapyahaṁ na paśyāmi? paśyāmyahamidānīmiti |
divy35:341: yo ’sau brāhmaṇaḥ, eṣa evāsau panthakastena kālena tena samayena |
divy35:342: yāstāstasya dvādaśa snuṣāḥ, etā eva tā dvādaśavargīyāḥ |
divy35:344: etarhyapi ābhirasyānarthaṁ kariṣyāma ityartham eva kṛtaḥ |
divy35:346: bhikṣavo buddhaṁ bhagavantaṁ pṛcchanti—paśya bhadanta bhagavatā āyuṣmān panthakaḥ parīttenāvavādenācodya saṁsārakāntārāduttārya atyantaniṣṭhe anuttare yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭāpitaḥ |
divy35:347: bhagavānāha—na bhikṣava etarhi yathā atīte ’pyadhvanyeṣo mayā parīttenāvavādenācodya mahatyaiśvaryādhipatye pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ |
divy35:350: bhūtabhūtaṁ bhikṣavo ’nyatamasmin kartavaṭake gṛhapariḥ prativasati āḍyo sahādhano mahābhogaḥ |
divy35:352: sa tayā sārdhaṁ trīṭati ramate paticārayati |
divy35:357: sa gṛhapatiḥ saṁlakṣayati—yadahamasyai prabhūtānaṁ kārṣāpaṇān dāsyāmi, parapuruṣaiḥ sārdhaṁ vihariṣyati |
divy35:359: tasmin karpaṭake śreṣṭhī prativasati tasya gṛhapatervayasyaḥ |
divy35:360: tasya haste prabhūtāḥ kārṣāpaṇāḥ sthāpitāh—yadi mama patnyā bhaktācchādena yogodvahanaṁ kuryāḥ |
divy35:362: tarraivānayena vyasanamāpannah. tayā sa dārako jñātibakena svahastabalena vā āyāpitā(payitvā) pālito vardhitaḥ |
divy35:363: sa mātaraṁ pṛcchati—amba, kimasmākaṁ pitā pitāmahāśca karmākārṣuh? sā saṁlakṣayati—yadyasya vakṣyāmi mahāsamudre potasaṁvyavahāriṇa āsann iti, sthānametadvidyate yadeṣo ’pi mahāsamudramavatariṣyatīti, tatraiva anayena vyasanamāpatsyate |
divy35:364: śrutamāhitastava putā ca pitāmahāśca ihaiva vāṇijyamakārṣuḥ |
divy35:365: sa kathayati—kārṣāpaṇān mamānuprayaccha, yairihaiva vāṇijyaṁ kariṣyāmi |
divy35:366: mātā kathayati—kuto mama kārṣāpaṇāh? tvaṁ mayā kathaṁcit jñātibalena svahastabakena āyāpitaḥ poṣitaḥ saṁvardhitaḥ |
divy35:367: kuto me kārṣāpaṇānāṁ vibhavah? api tvayaṁ śroṣṭī tava pitṛvayasyo bhavati |
divy35:368: asya sakāśāt kārṣāpaṇān gṛhītvā karma kuru |
divy35:372: tasya ca gṛhāt preṣyadārikāyāḥ saṁkāratalasyopari mṛtamūṣikāṁ dṛṣṭvā prayacchati cchorayitum |
divy35:373: sa śreṣṭhī tasya puruṣasya kathayati—yaḥ puruṣaḥ syāt, śakyate anayā mṛtamūṣikayā ātmānamuddhartum |
divy35:384: tena vāṇijakena dāraka ucyate—anuprayaccha asya biḍālasya mṛtamūṣikām |
divy35:387: sa saṁlakṣayati—yadyetān bhakṣayiṣyāmi, mūlameva bbhikṣitaṁ bhaviṣyati |
divy35:388: sa tān bhrāṣṭre bharjayitvā śītalasya pānīyasya vardhanīyasya pūrṇaṁ kṛtvā tadgṛhya tasmātsthānakānniṣkramya yasmin pradeśe kāṣṭhahārakā viśrāmyanti, tasmin pradeśe gatvāvasthitaḥ |
divy35:392: tena teṣāṁ kalāyānāṁ stoktaṁ dattaṁ śītalaṁ ca pānīyaṁ pātam |
divy35:394: bhāgineya, vayaṁ tāvat kalyamevotthāya gatvā idānīmāgacchāmaḥ |
divy35:395: tvamidānīṁ gacchan kiyatā āgamiṣyasi? taistasyaikaikaṁ kāṣṭhamanupradattam |
divy35:398: sa tāṁ vikrīya kalāyānāṁ gṛhītvā bharjayitvā udakasya kumbhaṁ pūrayitvā tasminneva praveśe gatvāvasthitaḥ |
divy35:399: te kāṣṭhahārakāstathaiva tena kalāyaiḥ saṁvibhaktāḥ, śītalena pānīyena saṁtarpitāḥ |
divy35:400: te tasya kathayati—bhāgineya, divase divase tvaṁ kalāyān pānīyaṁ ca gṛhītvā āgamya atraiva tiṣṭham |
divy35:403: sa teṣāṁ kathayati—mātula, mā yūyaṁ kāṣṭhabhārān vīrthāṁ nayatha |
divy35:415: tasya tatprabhūto lābhaḥ sa saṁlakṣayati—etat pratikruṣṭataraṁ vāṇijyānām yaduta ukkarikāpaṇaḥ |
divy35:419: sa saṁlakṣayati—etadapi pratikraṣṭataraṁ ca tadvāṇijyānāṁ pūrvavat |
divy35:421: tasya mūṣikāhairaṇyako mūṣikāhairaṇyaka iti saṁjñā saṁvṛttā |
divy35:422: te hairaṇyakāḥ kathayanti—bhavantaḥ, sarve vayamanena mūṣikāhairaṇyakenābhibhūtāḥ |
divy35:423: vayamenaṁ mānaṁ prāhayāmaḥ, yathā mahāsamudramavataret tatraivānayena vyasanamāpatsyate tathā kariṣyāma iti |
divy35:424: te tasya nātidūre sthitvā svaiḥ kathāsamlāpena tiṣṭhanti—yathāpi nāma bhavantaḥ puruṣo hastigrīvāyāṁ gatvā aśvapṛṣṭhena gacchet, aśvapṛṭhena gatvā śibikāyāṁ gacchet, śibikāyāṁ gatvā padbhyāṁ gacchet, evamevāsya mūṣkikāhairaṇyikasya pitā ca pitāmahāśca samudre potasaṁvyavahātiṇa āsan |
divy35:425: eṣa idānīṁ kuṛcchreṇa jīvikāṁ kalpayati hairaṇyikāpaṇaṁ vāhayatīti |
divy35:426: śrutvā sa kathayati—kiṁ kathayata? te kathayanti—tava pitā ca pitāmahāśca potasaṁvyavahāriṇa āsan |
divy35:427: sa tvamidānīṁ kṛcchreṇa jīvikāṁ kalpayasi, hairaṇyikāpaṇaṁ vāhayasi? sa gṛhaṁ gatvā mātaraṁ pṛcchati—amba, satyamasmākaṁ pitā ca pitāmahāśca mahāsamudre petasaṁvyavahāriṇa āsan? sā saṁlakṣayati—nūnamanena kiṁcitkutaścit śrutaṁ syāt |
divy35:434: tena ghaṇṭāvadhoṣaṇaṁ kṛtam—yo yuṣmākamutsahate mūṣikāhairaṇyena sārdhamaśulkenāgulmenātarapaṇyena mahāsamudramavataritum, sa mahāsamudragamanīyaṁ paṇyaṁ samudānayatu |
divy35:436: atha mūṣilāhairaṇyikaḥ kṛtamaṅgalakaitūhalasvastyayanaḥ śakaṭairbhārairmūṭaiḥ piṭakairuṣṭrairgobhirgardabhaiḥ paṇyamāropya mahāsamudraṁ saṁprasthitaḥ |
divy35:440: sārthavāhaḥ karṇadhārasya kathayati—kathaya kathaya bhoḥ puruṣa yathābhūtaṁ mahāsamudrasya varṇam |
divy35:441: 437.032ṭataḥ karṇadhāra uddhoṣayitumārabdhah—santyetasmin mahāsamudre imānyevamrūpāṇi ratnāni tadyathā—maṇayo muktā vaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravāla rajatajātarūpamaśmagarbho musāragalvo lohitakā dakṣiṇāvartaḥ |
divy35:442: yo yuṣmākamutsahate evamrūpai ratnairātmānaṁ samyaksukhena pratiṇayitum, mātāpitarau putradārān dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaṁ motrāmātyajñātisālohitaṁ kālena kālaṁ śramaṇabrāhmaṇebhyo dakṣiṇāṁ pratiṣṭhāpayitum, mūrdhagāminīṁ saubhāsikīṁ sukhavipākāmāyatyāṁ svargasaṁvartanīm, sa mahāsamudramavataratu |
divy35:445: sārthavāhaḥ saṁlakṣayati—kimidānīṁ vakṣyāmi avatarateti? sa karṇadhārasya kathayati—ghoṣaya bhoḥ puruṣa mahāsamudrasya yathābhūtaṁ varṇam |
divy35:446: tataḥ karṇadhāra uddhoṣitumāravdhah—śṛṇvantu bhavanto jambudvīpakā vaṇijaḥ |
divy35:447: santyasmin mahāsamudre imānyevaṁtūpāṇi mahānti mahābhayāni, tadyadhā timibhayaṁ timiṁgalabhayaṁ timitimiṁgalabhayamāvartabhayaṁ kumbhīrabhayaṁ śiśumārabhayamantarjalagatānāṁ parvatānāmāghātabhayam |
divy35:448: caurā apyatrāgavvhanti nīlaiḥ sitairvanacāriṇaḥ, asmākaṁ sarveṇa sarvaṁ jīvitādvyavaropayiṣyanti |
divy35:449: yena yuṣmākaṁ priyamātmānaṁ parityaktvā mātāpitarau putradāraṁ dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaṁ mitrāmātyañjātisālohitaṁ mahāsamudramavataratu |
divy35:452: tataḥ karṇadhārastriruddḥpṣaṇāvaghoṣaṇaṁ kṛtvā tataḥ paścādekāṁ vastrāṁ muñcati, dvitrivastrāṁ muñjati, yatastadvahanaṁ mahākarṇadhārasaṁdhānabalavadvāyusampreritaṁ mahāmegha iva saṁprasthito ’nuguṇena vāyunā yāvad ratnadvīpamanuprāptam |
divy35:453: tataḥ karṇadhāra uddhoṣayitumārabdhah—śṛṇvantu bhavanto jambudvīpakā vaṇijaḥ, santyasmin ratnadvīpe kācamaṇayo ratnasadṛśāḥ |
divy35:456: asminneva ca ratnadvīpe kroñjakumārikā nāma rākṣasyaḥ prativasanti |
divy35:457: tāḥ puruṣaṁ tathā upalālayanti yathā tatraivānayena vyasanamāpadyante |
divy35:459: tāni yaḥ paribhuṅkte, sa saptarātraṁ mūrcchitastiṣṭhati |
divy35:463: saptāahasyātyayāt tādṛśaṁ vāyumutsṛjanti yena vahanamapahriyate yathāpi tadkṛtakāryāṇām |
divy35:464: yaṁ śrutvā te vaṇijo ’vahitā apramattā avasthitāḥ |
divy35:469: sa kathayati—agradhanikaṁ tāvacchinadbhi, tataḥ paścānniveśaṁ kariṣyāmi |
divy35:470: sa tathā uktah—putra na tava putā na putāmaho dhanikaḥ kṛtaḥ, kutastava dhaniko jātah? sa kathayati—amba, ahameva jānāmi |
divy35:472: tena suvarṇasya phelāṁ pūrayitvā catasno mūṣikāścaturṣu pārśveṣu sthāpayitvā śroṣṭhigṛhaṁ gataḥ |
divy35:473: sa śreṣṭhī tadā tasyaiva tadvarṇaṁ bhāṣamāṇastiṣṭhati—paśyata bhavanto mūṣikāhairaṇyikaḥ kathaṁ puṇyamaheśākhyo yam yameva gṛhṇāti tṛṇaṁ vā loṣṭaṁ vā sarvaṁ tat suvarṇaṁ saṁpadyate |
divy35:477: sa praviśya kathayati—idaṁ te mūlam, ayaṁ lābhaḥ |
divy35:486: tava pitrā gacchatā mama hasto kārṣāpaṇāḥ sthāpitāḥ |
divy35:487: tena śreṣṭhinā duhitā sarvlamlāravibhūṣitā tasya bhāryārthamanupradattā |
divy35:489: kiṁ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo ’sau śreṣṭhī, ahameva tena kālena tena samayena |
divy35:490: yo ’sau mūṣikāhairaṇyakaḥ, eṣa eva panthakastena kālena tena samayena |
divy35:492: etarhyapyeṣa mayā parittenāvavādenāvavādya saṁsārakāntārāduttārya atyantaniṣṭhe ’nuttare yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ |
divy35:494: bhikṣavo buddhaṁ bhagavantaṁ pṛcchanti—kiṁ bhadanta panthakena karma kṛtam yasya karmaṇo vipākena dhanvaḥ paramadhanvaścūḍaḥ paramacūḍo jātah? panthakenaiva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāni |
divy35:495: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni ca |
divy35:497: sāmagrīṁ prāpya kālaṁ ca phalanti khalu dehinām (7)|
divy35:498: bhūtapūrvaṁ bhikṣavo viṁśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṁ kāśyapo nāma śastā loka utpannastathāgato ’rhan samyaksambuddho vidyāciraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṁ ca manuṣyāṇāṁ ca buddho bhagavān |
divy35:499: sa viṁśatibhirbhikṣusahasraiḥ parivāro vārāṇasīmupaniśritya viharati sma |
divy35:501: anena tatra mātsaryeṇa na kasyaciccatuṣpadikāpi gāthā uddiṣṭo |
divy35:505: sa saṁlakṣayati—yadi sūkarān praghātya nayiṣyāmi, māṁsasya krayiko na bhaviṣyati, kledaṁ gamiṣyati |
divy35:507: tatra tatra praghātya neṣyāmi, yatra yatra krāyiko ’sti |
divy35:508: sa prabhūtān sūkarāñ jānuṣu buddhvā nāvamāropya saṁprasthitaḥ |
divy35:515: sa saṁlakṣayati—kiṁ tāvadayaṁ mṛtah āhosvijjīvatīti? paśyati yāvajjīvati |
divy35:516: sa tena gajamujasadṛśaṁ bāhumabhiprasārya uddhṛtya vālukāyāḥ shalaṁ kṛtvā tatrāvamūrdhakaḥ sthāpitāḥ |
divy35:520: sa tena pādānusāreṇa gato yāvatpaśyati pañcamātrāṇi pratyekabuddhaśatāni |
divy35:521: sa teṣāṁ patreṇa puṣpeṇa phalena dantakāṣṭhena copasthānaṁ kartumārabdhaḥ |
divy35:524: atha te pratyekabuddhāḥ paryaṅka buddhvā dhyāyanti |
divy35:525: tadā so ’pyekānte sthitvā paryaṅkaṁ buddhcā dhyāyati |
divy35:529: yo ’sau kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya pravacane bhikṣastripiṭah āsīt, paścādasau saukarikaḥ, eṣa eva panthako bhikṣuḥ |
divy35:530: yadanena mātsaryeṇa na kasyaciccatuṣpadikā gāthā uddiṣṭā, yacca sūkarān praghātya yaccāsaṁjñisattvebhya ihopapannaḥ, tasya karmaṇo vipākena cūḍaḥ paramacūḍo dhanvaḥ paramadhanvaḥ saṁvṛttaḥ |
divy35:532: yadā āyuṣmān panthakaḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajitaḥ, jīvakena śrutam—panthakaḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajita iti |
divy35:533: sa saṁlakṣayati—yadi bhagavān rājagṛhamāgamiṣyati, ahaṁ buddhapramukhaṁ bhikṣusaṁghaṁ bhojayiṣyāmi sthāpayitvā bhadantaṁ panthakam |
divy35:534: bhagavān yathābhiramyaṁ śrāvastīṁ vihṛtya yena rājagṛhe tena cārikāṁ prakrāntaḥ |
divy35:537: aśrauṣījjīvakaḥ kumārabhūtah—bhagavān magadheṣu janapadacārikāṁ caran rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe |
divy35:539: apasaṁkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānto niṣaṇṇaḥ |
divy35:540: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṁ jīvakaṁ kumārabhūtaṁ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṁdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṁpraharṣayati |
divy35:541: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṁdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṁpraharṣya tūṣṇīm |
divy35:542: atha jīvakaḥ kumārabhūtah utthāyāsanādekāṁsamuttarāsaṅgaṁ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṁstenāñjaliṁ praṇamya bhagavantametadvocat—adhivāsayatu me bhagavāñchvo ’ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṁ bhikṣusaṁghena |
divy35:544: sa na śaknoti bhagavantaṁ vaktuṁ sthāpayitvā bhadantaṁ panthakam |
divy35:545: atha jīvakaḥ kumārabhūto bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavato ’ntikāt prakrānto yenāyuṣmānāndastenopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy35:546: upasaṁkramyāyuṣmata ānandasya pādau śirasā vinditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ |
divy35:547: ekāntaniṣaṇṇo jīvakaḥ kumārabhūta āyucmantamānandimadamavocat—yatkhalu bhadanta ānanda jānīyāh—mayā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṁghaḥ śvo ’ntargehe bhaktenopanimantritaḥ sthāpayitvā bhadantaṁ panthakam |
divy35:548: yathā te jīvaka kuśalānāṁ dharmāṇāṁ vṛddhirbhavati |
divy35:549: atha jīvakaḥ kumārabhūta āyuṣmata ānandasya bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya āyuṣmata ānandasya pādau śirasā vanditvā prakrāntaḥ |
divy35:550: athāyuṣmānānando ’ciraprakrāntaṁ jīvakaṁ kumārabhūtaṁ viditvā yenāyuṣmān pathakastenopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy35:551: upasaṁkramyāyuṣmantaṁ panthakamidamavocat—yatkhalvāyuṣman panthaka jānīyāh—jīvakena kumārabhūtena buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṁghaḥ śvo ’ntargṛhe bhaktenopapanimantritaḥ shāpyitvā āyuṣmantaṁ panthakam |
divy35:553: sa jīvakaḥ kumārabhūtastāmeva rātriṁ śuciṁ praṇītaṁ khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ samudānīya kalyamevotthāya āsanāni prajñapya udakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato dūtena kālamārocayati—samaye bhadanta, sajjaṁ bhaktam yasyedānīṁ bhagavān kālaṁ manyate |
divy35:554: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṁghapuraskṛto yena jīvakasya kumārabhūtasya niveśanaṁ tenopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy35:557: jīvakaḥ kumārabhūtaḥ sauvarṇabhṛṅgāraṁ gṛhītvā vṛddhānte tiṣṭhati |
divy35:559: jīvikaḥ kumārabhūtaḥ kathayati—kiṁ kāraṇaṁ bhagavan vāridhārāṁ na pratigṛhṇāti |
divy35:563: jīvakaḥ kathayati—bhagavan, nāsau mayā nimantrita iti |
divy35:564: bhagavānāha—na tvayā jīvaka buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṁgho nimantritah? bhagavan, nimantritaḥ |
divy35:565: kimasau bhikṣusaṁghādbahir na vā? bhagavān kathayati jīvakam—gaccha tvaṁ śabdāpaya |
divy35:566: jīvakaḥ kumārabhūtaḥ saṁlakṣayati—kiṁ cāpyahaṁ bhagavato gauraveṇa śabdāpayāmi, na satkṛtya pariveṣayiṣyāmi |
divy35:569: tena dūtena gatvā panthaka iti śabdo muktaḥ |
divy35:571: sa dūta āgatya jīvakasya kathayati—tathaiva veṇuvanaṁ kalandakanivāpo bhikṣūṇāṁ pūrṇastiṣṭhati |
divy35:572: bhagavānāha—gaccha tvaṁ kathaya yo bhūtapanthakaḥ sa āgacchatu |
divy35:573: sa gatvā kathayati—yo bhūtapanthakaḥ sa āgacchatu |
divy35:574: āyuṣmān panthakastatra gatvā svasyāṁ gatyāṁ niṣaṇṇāḥ |
divy35:577: bhagavān saṁlakṣayati—sumeruprakhye mahāśrāvake jīvakaḥ kumārabhūtaḥ kṣāntiṁ gṛhṇāti |
divy35:580: dharmatā khalu na tāvat sthabirashtavirāṇāṁ bhikṣūṇāṁ pātrāṇi pratigṛhyante, yāvadbhagavataḥ pātrapratigrahī na bhaviṣyati |
divy35:581: āyuṣmān panthakaḥ saṁlakṣayati—kiṁ kāraṇaṁ bhagavataḥ sthavirasthavirāṇāṁ bhikṣūṇāṁ pātrāṇi na gṛhyante? mayā atra guṇodbhāvanā kartavyā |
divy35:582: āyuṣmatā panthakenādharmāsanaṁ kṛtvā gajabhujasadṛśaṁ bāhumabhiprasārya bhagavataḥ pātraṁ gṛhītam |
divy35:588: sa jalapariṣekapratyāgataprāṇa āyuṣmataḥ panthakasya pādayor nipatya kṣamāpayati, gāthāṁ ca bhāṣate— nityaṁ caityaguṇo hi candanaraso nityaṁ sugandhayutpalaṁ nityaṁ bhāsati kāñcanasya vimalaṁ vaiḍūryaśuddham |
divy35:589: nityaṁ pāpajane hi krodhamatulaṁ pāṣāṇarekhopamaṁ nityaṁ cāryajaneṣu prātirvasate kṣāntirdhruvā hyarhatām (8)|
divy35:592: bhikṣavo buddhaṁ bhagavantaṁ pṛcchanti—paśya bhadanta, yadā jīvakaḥ kumārabhūta āyuṣmataḥ panthakasya guṇānāmanabhijñastadā asatkāraḥ prayuktaḥ, yadā guṇānāmabhijñastadā pādayor nipatya kṣamāpayati |
divy35:593: bhagavānāh—na bhikṣava etarhi yathātīte ’dhvanyeṣo ’sya guṇānāmanabhijñah,tadā asatkāraṁ prayuktavān |
divy35:597: bhūtapūrvaṁ bhikṣava uttarāpathāt sārthavāḥ pañcaśatamaśvapaṇyamādāya madhyadeśamāgataḥ |
divy35:599: sa yameva divasamavakrāntastameva divasamupādāya te ’śvā na bhūyo heṣante |
divy35:600: sārthavahaḥ saṁlakṣayati—kiṁ ca mamāśvānāṁ kaścid rogaḥ prādurbhūto bhaviṣyati yena te na heṣante? apareṇa samayenāśvā vaḍavā prasūtā |
divy35:602: sa yameva divasamupādāya te ’śvāḥ saṁcartumapi nārabdhāḥ |
divy35:603: sārthavāhaḥ saṁlakṣayati—nūnamayaṁ daurbhāgyasattvo jātah asya doṣaṇa mamāśvānāṁ rogaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ |
divy35:608: sa saṁlakṣayati—yadi gamiṣyāmi, aśvānāṁ khurāḥ kledaṁ gamiṣyanti, apaṇyoobhaviṣyanti |
divy35:610: sa tasyaiva varṣāmuṣitasya tadvāsino yo śilpinaste svena śilpenopasthānaṁ kurvānti |
divy35:619: sa tasya kathayati—bhoḥ puruṣa, aticireṇa tvamāgataḥ |
divy35:623: sa kathayati—api tvayamekaḥ kiśorastiṣṭhati, yadi prayo ’si, gṛhītvā gaccha |
divy35:629: sa patnyā uktah—asti kiṁcittvayā tasya sakāśāllabdham? labdham |
divy35:634: sa pakkamānānāṁ bhāṇḍānāṁ madhye parisarpanna kiṁcidbhāṇḍaṁ bhinatti |
divy35:643: tena kumbhakāreṇa patnī uktā—bhadre, śobhanaḥ kiśorakaḥ |
divy35:644: na bhūyo mayā mṛttikā voḍhavyā bhaviṣyati |
divy35:648: tena kālena tena samayena vārāṇasyāṁ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṁ kārayati ṛddhaṁ ca sphītaṁ ca bahujanamanuṣyaṁ ca |
divy35:651: taistasya saṁdiṣṭam—karapratyāyān vā anuprayaccha udyānam vā |
divy35:653: sa teṣāṁ karapratyāyān nānuprayacchati, nāpi taṁ sa udyānaṁ samāgataḥ |
divy35:655: brahmadattena rājñā śrutam—uttarāpathāt sārthavāho ’śvapaṇyamādāya vārāṇasīmanuprāpta iti |
divy35:656: so ’mātyānāmantrayate sma—bhavantaḥ, kiyacciraṁ mayehaṁ praviṣṭena sthātavyam? gacchata, aśvājāneyaṁ paryeṣadhvam |
divy35:660: sārthavāhaṁ dṛṣṭvā te kathayanti—bhavanto ’śvāvaḍavāyā aśvājāneyo jātaḥ |
divy35:662: sārthavāhamupasaṁkramya pṛcchanti—asti kaścidaśvastvayā vikrītaḥ kasyacidvā datta iti? sa kathayati—nāsti kaścidvikrītaḥ |
divy35:663: api tvasti mayā pūjitake ’dhiṣṭhāne ’maṅgalakaḥ kiśorakaḥ kumbhakārasya datta iti |
divy35:664: te ’nyonyaṁ kathayanti—bhavantaḥ, mahāmūrkho ’yaṁ sārthavāhaḥ, yo ’yaṁ maṅgalamapahāyāmaṅgalānevādāyāgata iti |
divy35:667: upasaṁkramya kathayanti—kimanena kiśorakena karoṣi? sa āha—eṣa mama mṛttikāṁ vahati |
divy35:668: te kathayati—vayaṁ te tathā gardabhamanuprayacchāmaḥ, tvamasmākamamumanuprayacchasva |
divy35:672: te kathayanti—evaṁ cet saṁpradhāraya vayaṁ śvo bhūya āgamiṣyāmaḥ |
divy35:674: sa kiśorakaḥ kathayati—kimarthaṁ nānuprayacchasi? kiṁ tvaṁ jānāsi mayā mṛttikā voḍhavyā tuṣāśca kuṭisakaṇṭaṁ bhakṣitavyam |
divy35:675: mayā rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣikto vāḍhavyaḥ, sauvarṇasthāle madhumrākṣitakā mūlakā bhakṣitavyāḥ |
divy35:676: te yadi saṁkathayanti keśoraka iti, vaktavyāh—kiṁ lajjadhvaṁ vaktumaśvājāneya iti? śvaḥ punarāgatvā te kathayiṣyanti mūlyenānuprayaccheti |
divy35:677: vaktavyāh—suvarṇalakṣaṁ vānuprayacchatha yāvadvā dakṣiṇena sakthnā kariṣyati tāvadanuprayacchati |
divy35:678: te ’parasmin divase upasaṁkramya pṛcchanti—bhoḥ puruṣa, saṁpradhāritaṁ tvayā? saṁpradhāritam—kiṁ lajjadhvaṁ vaktumaśvājāneya iti? te kathayanti—mūrkhaḥ sa eṣaḥ |
divy35:683: sa kathayati—suvarṇalakṣaṁ vānuprayaccḥ, yāvadvā suvarṇalakṣaṁ dakṣiṇena sakthnā kariṣyati |
divy35:687: tairbrahmadattasya rājñaḥ saṁdiṣṭaṁ suvarṇalakṣeṇa aśvājāneyo labhyate |
divy35:688: rājñāpi saṁdiṣṭam—yūyam yāvatā mūlyena tāvatā gṛhṇīta |
divy35:694: kiṁ sarogo bhavadbhiraśvājāneya ānītah? api tu samanuyuñjyāmahe tāvadenam |
divy35:695: atha sūto gāthāṁ bhāṣate— smarasi turaga ghaṭikarasya śālāṁ kimiha vidhairya viprayukraḥ |
divy35:697: na carasi bahumatastadarthe māsidiha hi cara yānasahasrapūrṇayāyī |
divy35:698: hyavasanamidaṁ tṛṣāpanītaṁ na carasi kiṁ vada me ’dya sādhu pṛṣṭaḥ (10)|
divy35:701: tvamiha vidhihitapradābhimānī na ca vihito bhavato yathāvadasmi |
divy35:702: nidhanamahamiha prayāyamāśu na ca biduṣāya taraya pūrvyām (12)|
divy35:703: suciramapi hi na sajjanāvamāno yadi guṇavānasi saumya nāvamānaḥ |
divy35:704: kṣaṇamāpi khalu sajjanāvamāno yadi guṇavānasi nāvamānaḥ (13)|
divy35:705: sūto rājñaḥ kathayati—devasyānupūrvī na kṛtā yanaiṣa yavasayogyāśanaṁ na gṛhṇāti |
divy35:711: sa tasya śataśalākaṁ chatraṁ mūrdhni dhārayati |
divy35:712: rājño jyeṣṭhā duhitā sauvarṇena maṇivyajanena makṣikān vārayati |
divy35:713: rājño ’gramahiṣī sauvargasthāle madhumrakṣitakān mūlān bhakṣayato dhārayati |
divy35:715: rājā kathayati—eṣa nāma rājā, nāhaṁ sa rājeti |
divy35:716: sūtaḥ kathayati—deva, nāsya sarvakālameṣa upacāraḥ kriyate |
divy35:718: rājā kathayati—yattāvadatītaṁ na śakyaṁ tatpunaḥ kartum, yadavaśiṣṭaṁ tatkriyatām |
divy35:719: yasmin pradeśe tāmrapaḍḍairbaddhaḥ, tasya rājño jyeṣṭhaḥ putraḥ śataśalākāṁ dhārayati, rājño jyeṣṭhā duhitā sauvarṇamaṇimayavālavyajanena makṣikān vārayati, rājño ’gramāhiṣī sauvarṇena sthālena madhumrakṣitakān mūlān bhakṣayato dhārayati, rājño ’mātyaḥ sauvarṇena lakṣaṇena laḍḍīśchorayati |
divy35:721: sasṛtaparamasugandhivilepanānudhārī madhuramadhurakṛtāntarānurāgā nṛpamahiṣī turagottamāya dattā rājñā |
divy35:723: rājā sūtaṁ pṛcchati—rājā asya pṛṣṭhaṁ duḥkhayati |
divy35:728: rājā sūtaṁ pṛcchati—eṣo bibheti? deva, naiṣa bibheti |
divy35:729: api tu mā rājānaṁ pucchodakena sekṣyāmīti |
divy35:733: sāmantarājaiḥ śrutam—yathā rājā brahmadatta udyānaṁ gata iti |
divy35:735: rājñā brahmadattena śrutaṁ sāmantarājair nagaradvārāṇi nigṛhītānīti |
divy35:737: antarā ca vārāṇasyantarā codyānamatrāntarā brahmavatī nāma puṣkiriṇyutpalakuṁdapuṇḍarīkasaṁchannā |
divy35:739: rājā tuṣṭo ’matyānāṁ kathayati—bhavantaḥ, yorājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhnābhiṣiktasya jīvitamanuprayacchati, kiṁ tasya kartavyam? deva, upārdharājyaṁ dātavyam |
divy35:741: kimasyopārdharājyena? api tvenamāgamya saptāhaṁ dānāni dīyantām, puṇyāni kriyantām, akālakaumudī ca kriyatām |
divy35:742: amātyaiḥ saptāahaṁ dānāni dātumārabdhāni, puṇyāni kartumārabdhāni, saptāhamakālakaumudī prasthāpitā |
divy35:743: sārthavāhaḥ puruṣān pṛcchati—bhavantaḥ, kimakālakaumudī vartate? te ’sya kathayanti—pūjitaṁ nāmādhiṣṭhānam |
divy35:744: tataḥ kumbhakārasya sakāśāt suvarṇalakṣeṇāśvājāneyaṁ gṛhītvā ihānītam |
divy35:746: tamāgamya saptāhaṁ dānāni dātumārabdhāni, puṇyāni kriyante, akālakaumudī ca prasthāpitā |
divy35:747: sārthavāhaḥ saṁlakṣayati—yo mayā chorito nāma, sa eṣa kiśorako ’śvājāneyaḥ syāt? tattāvadgatvā paśyāmi |
divy35:749: sa tenāśvājāneyenoktah—bhoḥ puruṣa, kiṁ tvayā teṣāmaśvānāṁ sakāśāllabdham? mayaikākinaiva tasya kumbhakārasya suvarṇalakṣaṁ dattam |
divy35:753: kiṁ manyadhve bḥkṣavo yo ’sau sārthavāhaḥ, eṣa eva jīvakastena kālena tena samayena |
divy35:754: yo ’śvājāneyaḥ, eṣa eva panthakastena kālena tena samayena |
divy35:755: tadāpi yadā asyaiṣa guṇānāmanabhijñaḥ, tadāsyāsatkāraṁ prayuktavān |
divy35:756: yadā tu guṇānāmabhijñaḥ, tadā pādayor nipatya kṣamāpitavān |
divy35:757: etarhyapyeṣa yadā guṇānāmanabhijñaḥ, tadā asatkāraṁ prayuktavān |
divy35:758: yadā guṇānāmabhijñaḥ, tadā pādayor nipatya kṣamapayati |
